mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_business_log( channel_id, cat_id, cart_id, product_name, product_id, err_type, status, model, code, sku, err_msg, created, creater, modified, modifier) VALUES ( #{channelId}, #{catId}, #{cartId}, #{productName}, #{productId}, #{errType}, #{status}, #{model}, #{code}, #{sku}, #{errMsg}, #{created}, #{created}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
